intro: Hieracium hethlandiae, commonly known as Hethland's hawkweed, is a flowering plant native to the United Kingdom. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and ragworts. The plant typically grows in grassy areas and is characterized by its yellow flowers and hairy stems. It has small, lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Hieracium hethlandiae is a rare species, and its conservation status is of interest to botanists due to its limited distribution.
